segments.text: There are lots of new teachers in our class this semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , so what do you think about the teachers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To be honest , I like all of them , except for the math teacher . Though he must be quite young , he seems like an old person . He's so boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so too . I don't like him either . Well , who do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It might be the English teacher . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . She speaks very clearly and doesn't use very complicated words so that it is easy for us to understand her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is a pretty good teacher ! With her help I think I can make great progress in English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I like her way of teaching . She told us not to cram for exams , and to pay more attention to communicating than memorizing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's a good way to develop our language ability .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , our new math teacher is a good person . He just can't find an appropriate way to teach us .
segments.speaker: S2
